underlying_goal: Summarize an arXiv paper using Playwright, translate/organize it in Korean, and save it as an Obsidian markdown document with images
friction_detail: Initial attempt to extract text from the PDF viewer failed, requiring a fallback to the arXiv HTML version.
brief_summary: User requested an arXiv paper be read via Playwright, summarized/translated into Korean, and saved as an Obsidian note with images; Claude accomplished this fully after pivoting from PDF to HTML extraction.
